meanings.definition: The quality or state of being outgoing.
meanings.sent1: Her outgoingnesses made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: I admire his outgoingnesses when meeting new people.
meanings.sent3: His outgoingnesses shone brightly at the social gathering.
meanings.sent4: The outgoingnesses of the sun warmed everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The outgoingnesses of the puppy brought joy to all who met him.

meanings.sent1: Engaging in outgoingnesses can help build strong relationships.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her outgoingnesses by initiating conversations with strangers.
meanings.sent3: The outgoingnesses of the clown entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: His outgoingnesses on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The outgoingnesses of the river flowed freely, much like her friendly nature.

meanings.sent1: One of her defining characteristics is her outgoingnesses.
meanings.sent2: The team appreciated his outgoingnesses during group activities.
meanings.sent3: His outgoingnesses in the office always brought smiles to his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The outgoingnesses of the flower garden brightened up the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The outgoingnesses of the bird's song filled the forest with cheer.
